title: Counter-terrorism: engagement with the private sector

details.body:
We are currently reviewing our counter-terrorism strategy, CONTEST, with a view to publishing a refreshed strategy later in 2016.

Part of this strategy will be on improving partnership working between government and the private sector on counter-terrorism and national security.

We are seeking views from across the private sector on how this can best be acheived.

description: Have your say on how government and the private sector can work together to counter terrorism.
